modName: AutoHarvest - Loot Container and Deadbodies - DELETED
summary: This mod will allow the player to harvest, loot or search for items, ingredients, gold and is fully configurable. can be set to automatically harvest within a defined distance.
descriptionHtml:
[b][color=Darkkhaki]DESCRIPTION:[/color][/b]

This mod will allow the player to harvest, loot or search for items, ingredients and gold and is fully configurable.
For greater immersion there is an option to use a spell to harvest or the mod can be set to automatically harvest within a defined distance.
There is an option to add items not usually harvested like kettles or items from another mod.


[b][color=Darkkhaki]REQUIREMENTS:[/color][/b]

[url=http://skse.silverlock.org/]SKSE v2.0.7[/url]+
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/12604]SkyUI v5.2SE[/url]+


[b][color=Darkkhaki]RECOMMENDED MODS:[/color][/b]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/266]Unofficial Skyrim Special Edition Patch[/url] by Unofficial Patch Project Team


[b][color=Darkkhaki]HOW TO USE:[/color][/b]

Launch your game, please wait mcm-menu registered.
Click Escape in-game and you will find MCM below Save and Load on your menu.
OK, AutoHarvest is start up when Opened the mcm-menu. =)

Press hotkey to pause or restart autoharvest and loot.
In inventory press hotkey on selected item for adding/removing it to the userlist.


[b][color=Darkkhaki]MCM MENU INFORMATION:[/color][/b]

This mod uses the MCM or Mod Configuration Menu.

[b][color=khaki]Auto Harvest Section:[/color][/b]
Configuration options for automatically harvesting "enabled" items that are exposed and not in containers or bodies. Turn on Auto-harvest here (or use the alternate section for the "Harvest Spell"). Enable or disable items you want harvested by ticking the appropriate boxes. There is an option to click everything. For USER LIST information see separate section listing below.

[b][color=khaki]Container/DeadBodies Section:[/color][/b]
Use this menu to turn on or off automatically harvesting from barrels/containers/chests/urns and dressers/wardrobes/end-tables. This is a separate operation. This will harvest the items enabled here by ticking the boxes. For USER LIST information see separate section listing below.

[b][color=khaki]Userlist section:[/color][/b]
This menu is for MANAGING items you, the user, added to be harvested. These may be items not yet added to the main mod or added by DLC or another mod you are using. You have room for 128 items. Once registered items can be enabled or disabled here.


[b][color=Darkkhaki]KNOWN ISSUES:[/color][/b]

Do not support a chest trap.
author: towawot
